00061 
00062 bit ms_data_direction;
00063 static _MEM_TYPE_SLOW_ U8  dCBWTag[4];
00064 
00065 extern _MEM_TYPE_SLOW_ U8  g_scsi_status;
00066 extern _MEM_TYPE_FAST_ U32 g_scsi_data_remaining;
00067 extern bit ms_multiple_drive;
00068 extern _MEM_TYPE_SLOW_ U8  g_scsi_command[16];
00069 
00070 extern U8   endpoint_status[MAX_EP_NB];
00071 
00072 _MEM_TYPE_SLOW_ U8 usb_LUN;
00073 
00074 
00075 void usb_mass_storage_cbw (void);
00076 void usb_mass_storage_csw (void);
00077 
00087 void storage_task_init(void)
00088 {
00089    Leds_init();
00090    Usb_enable_sof_interrupt();
00091    df_mem_init();    // Init the hw/sw ressources required to drive the DF.
00092 }
00093 
00094 
00103 void storage_task(void)
00104 {
00105    if (Is_device_enumerated())
00106    {
00107       Usb_select_endpoint(EP_MS_OUT);
00108       if (Is_usb_receive_out())
00109       {
00110          usb_mass_storage_cbw();
00111          usb_mass_storage_csw();
00112       }
00113    }
00114 }
00115 
00116 
00117 
00118 
00119 
00120 
00130 void usb_mass_storage_cbw (void)
00131 {
00132 bit cbw_error;
00133 U8  c;
00134 U8  dummy;
00135 
00136    cbw_error = FALSE;
00137    Usb_select_endpoint(EP_MS_OUT);           
00138    if (0x55 != Usb_read_byte())
00139       { cbw_error = TRUE; } 
00140    if (0x53 != Usb_read_byte())
00141       { cbw_error = TRUE; } 
00142    if (0x42 != Usb_read_byte())
00143       { cbw_error = TRUE; } 
00144    if (0x43 != Usb_read_byte())
00145       { cbw_error = TRUE; } 
00146    if (cbw_error)
00147    {
00148       Usb_ack_receive_out();
00149       Usb_select_endpoint(EP_MS_IN);
00150       Usb_enable_stall_handshake();
00151       endpoint_status[(EP_MS_IN & MSK_EP_DIR)] = 0x01;
00152       return;
00153    }
00154 
00155    dCBWTag[0] = Usb_read_byte();             
00156    dCBWTag[1] = Usb_read_byte();
00157    dCBWTag[2] = Usb_read_byte();
00158    dCBWTag[3] = Usb_read_byte();
00159    
00160    LSB0(g_scsi_data_remaining) = Usb_read_byte();
00161    LSB1(g_scsi_data_remaining) = Usb_read_byte();
00162    LSB2(g_scsi_data_remaining) = Usb_read_byte();
00163    LSB3(g_scsi_data_remaining) = Usb_read_byte();
00164 
00165    if (Usb_read_byte() != 0x00)              
00166    {
00167       Usb_set_ms_data_direction_in();
00168    }
00169    else
00170    {
00171       Usb_set_ms_data_direction_out();
00172    }
00173 
00174    usb_LUN = Usb_read_byte();
00175 
00176    if (!ms_multiple_drive)
00177    {
00178       usb_LUN = get_cur_lun();
00179    }
00180 
00181    dummy      = Usb_read_byte();                // dummy CBWCBLength read
00182 
00183 
00184    for (c=0; c<16; c++)                         // store scsi_command
00185    {
00186       g_scsi_command[c] = Usb_read_byte();
00187    }
00188    Usb_ack_receive_out();
00189 
00190    if (Is_usb_ms_data_direction_in())
00191    {
00192       Usb_select_endpoint(EP_MS_IN);
00193    }
00194 
00195    if (TRUE != scsi_decode_command())
00196    {
00197       U8 ep;
00198       Usb_enable_stall_handshake();
00199       if (Is_usb_ms_data_direction_in())
00200       {
00201          ep = (EP_MS_IN & MSK_EP_DIR);
00202       }else{
00203          ep = (EP_MS_OUT & MSK_EP_DIR);
00204       }
00205       endpoint_status[ep] = 0x01;
00206    }
00207 }
00208 
00209 
00218 void usb_mass_storage_csw (void)
00219 {
00220    Usb_select_endpoint(EP_MS_IN);
00221    while (Is_usb_endpoint_stall_requested())
00222    {
00223       Usb_select_endpoint(EP_CONTROL);
00224       if (Is_usb_receive_setup())       { usb_process_request(); }
00225       Usb_select_endpoint(EP_MS_IN);
00226    }
00227 
00228    Usb_select_endpoint(EP_MS_OUT);
00229    while (Is_usb_endpoint_stall_requested())
00230    {
00231       Usb_select_endpoint(EP_CONTROL);
00232       if (Is_usb_receive_setup())       { usb_process_request(); }
00233       Usb_select_endpoint(EP_MS_OUT);
00234    }
00235 
00236 
00237    Usb_select_endpoint(EP_MS_IN);
00238    while(!Is_usb_write_enabled())
00239    {
00240       if(!Is_usb_endpoint_enabled())   return; // USB Reset
00241    }
00243    Usb_write_byte(0x55);                                 
00244    Usb_write_byte(0x53);                                 
00245    Usb_write_byte(0x42);                                 
00246    Usb_write_byte(0x53);                                 
00247 
00248    Usb_write_byte(dCBWTag[0]);
00249    Usb_write_byte(dCBWTag[1]);
00250    Usb_write_byte(dCBWTag[2]);
00251    Usb_write_byte(dCBWTag[3]);
00253    Usb_write_byte( LSB0(g_scsi_data_remaining) );
00254    Usb_write_byte( LSB1(g_scsi_data_remaining) );
00255    Usb_write_byte( LSB2(g_scsi_data_remaining) );
00256    Usb_write_byte( LSB3(g_scsi_data_remaining) );
00257 
00259    Usb_write_byte(g_scsi_status);                        
00260 
00261    Usb_send_in();
00262 }
